questions.question: What is the primary difference between AWS Shield Standard and AWS Shield Advanced?
options: Shield Advanced only protects Amazon S3 buckets.
Shield Standard is a paid service, while Shield Advanced is free.
Shield Standard provides protection against all types of DDoS attacks, while Shield Advanced does not.
Shield Advanced offers enhanced protection and additional features such as detailed attack diagnostics and cost protection.
correct_answers: Shield Advanced offers enhanced protection and additional features such as detailed attack diagnostics and cost protection.
